name: Ginger Cake
description: A warm spiced ginger cake that's great as a treat or snack any time of the day. So easy to prepare and full of delicious Fall flavors. Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 2/3 cup dark brown sugar or regular sugar

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl mix all the flours, salt and baking powder. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl mix all the flours, salt and baking powder. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the rest of the ingredients except grated and candied ginger and blend them well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the rest of the ingredients except grated and candied ginger and blend them well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the fresh and candied ginger and give a quick mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the fresh and candied ginger and give a quick mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour batter in well greased pan
recipeInstructions.name: Pour batter in well greased pan

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 360 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean!
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 360 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean!

recipeInstructions.text: Enjoy a slice anytime of the day!!
recipeInstructions.name: Enjoy a slice anytime of the day!!

keywords: easy cake recipe, fall cake, spiced cake
